==== Apple iPhone / iPod Touch ====
==== Apple iPhone / iPod Touch ====
{{main|iPod Touch}}
{{main|iPod Touch}}
â   â
[[Image:IPod_Touch_2.0.png|thumb|120px|right|iPod Touch]]
 
In 2008 Apple released an SDK allowing individuals and game companies to develop software for the popular iPhone and iPod Touch hand-held devices. With an installed base of over 50 million units sold and over 20,000 games listed for sale on Apple iTunes App Store, the device has become a de-facto game console of its own. Mainstream game developers-- such as the Madden, Command and Conquer, Assassin's Creed, and NBA Live franchises-- have come or are soon coming to the platform.
